abstracts.cdata!:
This memorandum seeks Board approval for
            the release of the second tranche and waiver of conditions
            set due to the dramatic crisis Argentina has undergone. It
            summarizes the macroeconomic policies in place since early
            2002, the overall progress in implementing the reform
            program supported by the Structural Adjustment Loan (SAL)
            Project, and the actions taken by the Government of
            Argentina to meet specific conditions for release of the
            second tranche. However, three conditions were not met:
            namely a) reduction of the consolidated provincial fiscal
            deficit for 2001, b) implementing changes in the calculation
            of non-contributory pensions, and c) implementing a new
            system for the payment of family allowances. Waivers are
            proposed for the above three specific conditions, based on
            the overall strong implementation of the program and in view
            of the continuing macroeconomic stabilization, markedly
            improved fiscal performance of the provinces, the progress
            towards implementing a new payments system for family
            allowances, and the legal obstacles to the original pension
            reform measures.
